reviews.content: Works up to iOS 13.3, looks really nice and is a cool tweak for your iPhone X. Would recommend.

Great tweak to do something interesting with that boring old home bar. Its like having a handheld razor keyboard on your $1100 iphone. Its one of those tweaks that you show people and say “this is why my phone is better than yours”.
Esta funcionando en IOS 13.5 iphones 11 pro max
